name: Big Donko Cleans Up
description:
Arrow keys to move, Z to shoot.  Take pollution to the nets to get ammo.

#UkieGreenGameJam

We decided to create a game around the theme of ocean pollution as it is an issue that we as a team feel very passionate about.
In our game you play as a fish who fights back against the polluters and must clean up the mess before the ocean is filled with waste and becomes uninhabitable. The enemies in the game spawn trash that must be collected and deposited in the fishing nets, once deposited you are rewarded with ammunition you can use to defeat the polluters. If you don’t reach trash in time, it will disintegrate and add to the building waste level on the ocean floor.
